Package org.transitime.core

Contains the core classes that process the AVL data and create predictions, arrival/departure times, headway, etc.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ArrivalDepartureGenerator  
    HeadwayGenerator
    Defines the interface for generating headway information.
    PredictionGenerator
    Defines the interface for generating predictions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrivalDepartureGeneratorDefaultImpl
    For determining Arrival/Departure times based on a new GPS report and corresponding TemporalMatch.
    ArrivalDepartureGeneratorFactory
    For instantiating a ArrivalDepartureGenerator object that generates arrival/departure data when a new match is generated for a vehicle.
    AvlProcessor
    This is a very important high-level class.
    BlockAssigner
    Singleton class that handles block assignments from AVL feed.
    HeadwayGeneratorDefaultImpl  
    HeadwayGeneratorFactory
    For instantiating a HeadwayGenerator object that generates headway info when a new match is generated for a vehicle.
    MatchProcessor
    For generating predictions, arrival/departure times, headways etc.
    PredictionGeneratorDefaultImpl
    When a new match based on AVL data is made for a vehicle the methods in this class are used to generate the corresponding predictions.
    PredictionGeneratorFactory
    For instantiating a PredictionGenerator object that generates predictions when a new match is generated for a vehicle.
    RealTimeSchedAdhProcessor
    For determining the real-time schedule adherence for a predictable vehicle.
    ServiceUtils
    For working with service types, such as determining serviceId or appropriate block to use for a given epoch time.
    SpatialMatch
    Describes where an AVL report matches to an assignment spatially.
    SpatialMatcher
    For determining possible spatial matches.
    TemporalDifference
    For keeping track of how far off a vehicle is from the expected time.
    TemporalMatch
    Describes where an AVL report matches to an assignment temporally.
    TemporalMatcher
    Singleton class that does the temporal matching to determine where an AVL report matches to the block assignment.
    TimeoutHandler
    For handling when a vehicle doesn't report its position for too long.
    TravelTimes
    Singleton class that contains methods for determining how long a vehicle is expected to take to get from one point to another on the assignment.
    VehicleAtStopInfo
    So that VehicleState can keep track of whether vehicle is matched to a stop.
    VehicleState
    Keeps track of vehicle state including its block assignment, where it last matched to its assignment, and AVL reports.
    VehicleStateManager
    For keeping track of vehicle state.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BlockAssignmentMethod  

Package org.transitime.core Description

Contains the core classes that process the AVL data and create predictions, arrival/departure times, headway, etc. Contains all the key algorithms that are part of generating the data. This is the core package of the prediction system.
Author:
SkiBu Smith
